email.subject: Postdoctoral Fellow position in Software Engineering for AI Systems - Concordia University

position.title: Postdoctoral Fellow
position.description: The postdoc fellow will be involved in several projects related to the development, analysis and deployment of AI based systems. The postdoc will be encouraged to collaborate with and supervise DAS lab members and pursue their own relevant research interests.

requirements.experience: proven track record of research excellence in Software Engineering

department.name: Computer Science and Software Engineering
department.additional_info: Montreal is often voted as one of the best cities in Canada for its livability. The city has one of the highest university students per capita in North America and is often ranked as one of the best cities to study abroad.

application_review.status: accepted until the position is filled

contact.name: Emad Shihab, PhD, P.Eng
contact.department: Gina Cody School of Engineering and Computer Science

contribution_info.archive_info: links to a complete archive of messages posted to the list.
